bdi4jade.message

Class MessageGoal

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.message.MessageGoal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Goal, jade.content.Concept, jade.content.ContentElement, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable

    public class MessageGoal
extends java.lang.Object
implements Goal
    This class represents the goal of processing a message received by the agent.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setMessage

        protected void setMessage(jade.lang.acl.ACLMessage message)
        Sets the message of this goal. Ideally, the message should be final and initialized in the constructor. This method should be only used if persistence frameworks are used.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to set
